bounce.logic
Class Ball

java.lang.Object
  bounce.logic.Ball

public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a ball and stores the information needed to paint it. It is also capable of painting itself.

Field Summary
static double DEFAULT_DIAMETER
          The default diameter of a ball in meters.
 
Constructor Summary
Ball(double diameter)
          Creates a ball with the specified diameter.
Ball(double diameter, double x, double y)
          Creates a ball with the specified diameter, x position, and y position.
Ball(double diameter, double x, double y, Material material)
          Creates a ball with the specified diameter, x position, y position, and material.

getY

public double getY()
Gets the "y" position of the ball—that is, the height of the ball from the ground. This value is measured from the bottom of the ball.

Returns:
the "y" position of the ball in meters

setY

public void setY(double y)
Sets the "y" position of the ball—that is, the height of the ball from the ground. This value is measured from the bottom of the ball.

Parameters:
y - the "y" position of the ball in meters

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                  int drawingHeight)
Paints the ball using its stored values and the specified Graphics2D object.

Parameters:
g - the Graphics2D object that will paint the ball
drawingHeight - the height of the drawing area in pixels
